item.description:
The MIT Asian Dance Team is having their fall 2010 showcase in a few weeks. They do a lot of traditional Chinese dance in addition to modern dance. If anyone would like to join Anna, please RSVP

Saturday, December 11, 2010, 6-8pm
Kresge Auditorium, MIT campus
$7 at the door for MIT members
$10 for non-MIT members

Pay at the door.

We will meet at the entrance @ 5:40 pm to purchase tix and find seats. Please be on time.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: MIT Asian Dance Team Showcase - Saturday
